S. Raju, the Chief Management Officer, from the Management and Administration Department who had done Ph.D. in Human Resource Management, Acharya Nagarjuna University, Guntur, welcomes to NSRIT, where excellence is a tradition, and innovation is a way of life. At NSRIT, we are deeply committed to providing a transformative educational experience that prepares students to face the challenges of the modern world while contributing meaningfully to society.

As the Chief Management Officer, my vision is to foster a culture of academic excellence, discipline, and holistic growth. We aim to create an environment where students are inspired to pursue knowledge with passion, develop critical thinking, and embrace innovation. Through rigorous academic training, and excellent robust placement programs, and personal development initiatives, we ensure that every student is equipped with the skills, confidence, and integrity required to thrive in their chosen paths.

Our focus extends beyond academics to nurturing a strong moral foundation, instilling values of responsibility, teamwork, and leadership. At NSRIT, we believe in striking a balance between traditional values and modern educational practices, enabling students to excel in both personal and professional spheres.

With a dedicated team of faculty, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and a vision to continuously raise the bar of excellence, NSRIT is committed to shaping future-ready professionals and responsible citizens. Together, let us strive to achieve new heights and build a brighter future for our students, our institution, and our community.

 

Wishing you all success and a fulfilling journey at NSRIT. Warm regards, Dr. PS Raju Chief Management Officer Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT) ×
